summary: Configs ENB Enb Hollywood 2.5, Hollywood Evolution, Hollywood PowerColor
descriptionHtml:
[b]NEWS:[/b]

-NEW UPDATE ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.5 READY!
ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.5: Based ENB 114
[url=http://theradikmeri.minus.com/mDVOAj17k/1g]GALLERY SCREENSHOTS ENB HOLLYWOOD V2.5 , Evolution & PowerColor[/url] 
Install: Copy all files skyrim folder(also included data files)

ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.5 WrapperVersion: Grain Film On & Off:
New Enbbloom & enbeffectpreppas
Use data files required!!!: Dark Dungeons for ENB, Realistic Lighting, RevampedExteriorFog
[URL=http://minus.com/lnTfOpC8U4W5c][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jnTfOpC8U4W5c.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lCXvRcvGI705s][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jCXvRcvGI705s.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbzDn8rYWBxtc2][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbzDn8rYWBxtc2.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
------------------------------------------------
ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.5 EVOLUTION:
New Enbbloom, Older Hollywood 1.2 DOF, Fxaa High Quality
Use data files required!!!: RemoveAmbientInteriorFog, Realistic Lighting, RevampedExteriorFog
[URL=http://minus.com/lpvtL0ScTZ6Lb][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jpvtL0ScTZ6Lb.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbwA4GX1y5yF9v][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbwA4GX1y5yF9v.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbk1EHOPs7agyp][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbk1EHOPs7agyp.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
------------------------------------------------
ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.5 POWERCOLOR:
New Enbbloom & enbeffectpreppas, Injector fxaa saturation
Use data files required!!!: Dark Dungeons for ENB, Realistic Lighting, RevampedExteriorFog
[URL=http://minus.com/lbx1B6vNTDK4G8][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbx1B6vNTDK4G8.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lbprkflKwHBArT][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jbprkflKwHBArT.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/lpq1H4pqv15ig][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jpq1H4pqv15ig.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
-------------------------------------------------

Extras: Sunglare, Sky, Effects
-------------------------------------------------

Remove Letterbox: overwrites enbeffect
-------------------------------------------------

enbeffectprepass alternatives(DOF):

Bokeh, Matso 4.0 No Chroma, Less Dof, Older Hollywood 1.2, Very Less Bokeh, Very Less Bokeh & Sharpen, Very Less Dof
-----------------------------------------------
------------------------------------------------
HISTORY NEWS-------------------------------
-------------------------------------------------
ENB HOLLYWOOD 2.0 READY!!!!

Enb Based 113 Kage with Sun Rays Enabled. Enb use Realistic Lighting & RemvampedExteriorFog, It is necessary to copy these files and have them activated.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Remember Endorse Me ;)[/b]

----------------------------------------------------
----------------HISTORY NEWS:
----------------------------------------------------
-Added new file: New Special Config:
[b]ENB HOLLYWOOD 1.7 POWERCOLOR[/b]
It is a espcial configuration. An added for version 1.7. It is based on has much more saturation, less desaturation, and a palette clarified.
.Gallery Enb Hollywood 1.7 POWERCOLORin Minus:
[url=http://minus.com/m9wix5uuG/1g]ENB HOLLYWOOD V1.7 POWERCOLOR [/url]
Enjoy! ;)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gallery Enb Hollywood 1.7 in Minus:
[url=http://minus.com/mbgxwzDKEZ/1g]ENB HOLLYWOOD V1.7 [/url] 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
.Gallery Enb Hollywood Vintage in Minus:
[url=http://minus.com/mj1PJQXXQ/1g]ENB HOLLYWOOD Vintage [/url] 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
.Gallery Enb Hollywood 1.2 Evolution in Minus:
[url=http://minus.com/mVli0wGea/1g]ENB HOLLYWOOD V1.2 Evolution [/url] 
-------------------------------------------------
-Another mod I recommend: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8395]Natural Skyrim Rain [/url] 
-----------------------------------------------------------
-New Update Available: [b]ENB HOLLYWOOD V1.7:[/b]
List of changes:
-Added presets for all the option to choose between the effect \"GRAIN\" or \"NO GRAIN\"
-Having the option of adding Letterbox
[URL=http://minus.com/mElNZuZBc/60f][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jZ45fGoltULjX.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://minus.com/mElNZuZBc/61f][IMG]http://i.minus.com/jFfKbWDpbABXm.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Special Presets:
-[b]Enb Hollywood 1.2 Evolution:[/b] An enhanced version 1.2 with touch enb hollywood movie.
Screens:
-Vintage Hollywood: I\'m starting with this configuration, it is a very early version.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-SUNGLARE recommend this mod for my ENB. Since I have seen some sunglares may be incompatible.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1653]Alternate Sun glare [/url] 
-----------------------------------------------------------
-New Gallery Screenshots Enb Hollywood V1.5 in minus. The former have already reached the limit of 300 screens.
[url=http://minus.com/mVwNdCngi]ENB HOLLYWOOD V1.5 [/url] 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Remember Endorse Me ;)[/b]
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[b]Mods Recommended:[/b]
I recommend using the official DLC Textures.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8262]More Dynamic Shadows and Striping Fixed [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=85]Enhanced Nights [/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1653]Alternate Sun glare [/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10411]Better Villages WIP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1598]Enhanced Distant Terrainn[/url]
[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11336&searchtext=well+lit+cities]Well Lit Cities and Towns (Exterior) (WIP)[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2488]Better Males, Faces.[/url]
-Faces - GeonoxFaces 
-Underwear - Default 
-Use a mod for women\'s bodies and some eye or hair, what you like.

Special thanks:
Boris Vorontsov, Creator of ENBSeries
Plutoman and 747823, Creators of Realistic Lighting
Revamped Exterior Fog by gargorias
Remove Ambient Fog by gargorias
Artem1s A.k.a. Mindflux, for \"Dark Dungeons for ENB\"
author: TheRadikal
